synopsis.text: Training for the Hashira, the elite swordsmen of the Demon Slayer Corps, is underway, with the impending battle against Muzan Kibutsuji looming on the horizon. Each member of the Hashira, including Tanjiro, harbors their own aspirations and convictions, as they embark on a new chapter in their journey. This new story unfolds as they prepare for the final showdown, with the first episode, which was screened in cinemas as a special event, lasting approximately one hour.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
